title: Pulsefire Ezreal icon
body: Got Pulsefire Ezreal icon. But for what? I dont have ez skin.

replies.body: Hmmmm....well this is odd. I'm looking over your account, and it does look like the icon was added without you having *ever* owned Pulsefire Ez. I'm not 100% sure how the icon made its way to your account, but you're free to keep it if you'd like ^_^!
if i got free icon give me free pulsfire {{champion:81}}  skin ^_^
